div.div: Stability and change in geographic range size in the breeding and non-breeding season in relation to migratory groups.
div.p: (a) Change in current geographic range size (year 2000) by 2080 (SRES A2) grouped by migratory behavior ( S5 and S6 Appendices). (b) Proportional change in range size by 2080 (SRES A2) grouped by migratory behavior ( S5 and S6 Appendices).
